metrics.name: Recovery Team Cross-Training Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of recovery team roles with cross-trained personnel
metrics.formula: Cross-trained roles / Total critical roles
metrics.risk_definition: Deficiencies in recovery team cross-training extend recovery timelines, resulting in prolonged business disruption, customer impact, revenue loss, and potential inability to restore critical operations.

metrics.name: Infrastructure Recovery Automation
metrics.description: Percentage of infrastructure recovery processes that are automated
metrics.formula: Automated recovery processes / Total recovery processes
metrics.risk_definition: Deficiencies in infrastructure recovery automation extend recovery timelines, resulting in prolonged business disruption, customer impact, revenue loss, and potential inability to restore critical operations.

metrics.name: Recovery Plan Testing Realism
metrics.description: Quality score of recovery plan testing based on real-world scenario similarity
metrics.formula: Average realism score from recovery exercises
metrics.risk_definition: Deficiencies in recovery plan testing realism extend recovery timelines, resulting in prolonged business disruption, customer impact, revenue loss, and potential inability to restore critical operations.

metrics.name: Customer Data Recovery Priority
metrics.description: Percentage of customer data recovery meeting priority objectives
metrics.formula: Priority data recoveries meeting objectives / Total priority data
metrics.risk_definition: Deficiencies in customer data recovery priority extend recovery timelines, resulting in prolonged business disruption, customer impact, revenue loss, and potential inability to restore critical operations.

metrics.name: AI Systems Documentation Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with documented purposes, intended uses, and business contexts
metrics.formula: Documented AI systems / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Undocumented AI systems create blind spots for governance, compliance, and risk management, potentially leading to unauthorized AI deployments and misaligned business objectives.

metrics.name: AI Stakeholder Expectation Mapping
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with documented stakeholder expectations and requirements
metrics.formula: AI systems with stakeholder mapping / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Without stakeholder expectation mapping, AI systems may fail to meet user needs, create ethical concerns, or generate unexpected business impacts.

metrics.name: AI Regulatory Compliance Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems compliant with applicable regulatory requirements
metrics.formula: Compliant AI systems / Regulated AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Non-compliance with AI regulations exposes the organization to legal penalties, reputational damage, and operational restrictions.

metrics.name: AI Dependency Mapping Completeness
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with fully mapped dependencies on data, models, and infrastructure
metrics.formula: Fully mapped AI systems / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Unmapped AI dependencies create hidden risks from third-party components, data source changes, or infrastructure failures.

metrics.name: AI Risk Tolerance Definition Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with defined risk tolerance levels
metrics.formula: AI systems with risk tolerance / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Without defined risk tolerance, AI deployment decisions are inconsistent and may exceed organizational risk appetite.

metrics.name: AI Risk Assessment Completion Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with completed risk assessments within required timeframe
metrics.formula: AI risk assessments completed / Required assessments
metrics.risk_definition: Incomplete AI risk assessments leave potential vulnerabilities and threats unidentified and unmitigated.

metrics.name: AI Risk Integration with ERM
metrics.description: Percentage of AI risks integrated into enterprise risk management processes
metrics.formula: Integrated AI risks / Total AI risks
metrics.risk_definition: AI risks not integrated with ERM create governance gaps and prevent holistic risk visibility at the enterprise level.

metrics.name: AI Risk Communication Effectiveness
metrics.description: Percentage of AI risk stakeholders receiving timely risk communications
metrics.formula: Stakeholders receiving communications / Total stakeholders
metrics.risk_definition: Poor AI risk communication leads to uninformed decision-making and inadequate risk responses across the organization.

metrics.name: AI Governance Policy Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI system types covered by governance policies
metrics.formula: AI types with policies / Total AI system types
metrics.risk_definition: Gaps in AI governance policies allow inconsistent practices and ungoverned AI deployments across the organization.

metrics.name: AI Ethics Guidelines Acknowledgment
metrics.description: Percentage of AI practitioners acknowledging AI ethics guidelines
metrics.formula: Acknowledged practitioners / Total AI practitioners
metrics.risk_definition: Without ethics acknowledgment, AI development may proceed without consideration of fairness, transparency, and accountability.

metrics.name: AI Acceptable Use Policy Awareness
metrics.description: Percentage of employees aware of AI acceptable use policies
metrics.formula: Trained employees / Total employees with AI access
metrics.risk_definition: Employees unaware of AI acceptable use policies may misuse AI systems, creating legal, ethical, and security risks.

metrics.name: AI Policy Compliance Monitoring Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems actively monitored for policy compliance
metrics.formula: Monitored AI systems / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Unmonitored AI systems may operate outside policy boundaries without detection, creating compliance and security gaps.

metrics.name: AI Systems Inventory Completeness
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems in the organizational inventory
metrics.formula: Inventoried AI systems / Total known AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Incomplete AI inventory creates shadow AI systems that operate without governance, security controls, or oversight.

metrics.name: AI Model Catalog Completeness
metrics.description: Percentage of AI models cataloged with required metadata
metrics.formula: Fully cataloged models / Total deployed models
metrics.risk_definition: Uncataloged models lack traceability, making it impossible to track provenance, versions, or known limitations.

metrics.name: Training Data Inventory Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of training datasets inventoried with lineage information
metrics.formula: Inventoried datasets / Total training datasets
metrics.risk_definition: Uninventoried training data prevents data quality validation, bias detection, and compliance with data regulations.

metrics.name: AI Dependency Documentation Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of AI system dependencies documented and tracked
metrics.formula: Documented dependencies / Total AI dependencies
metrics.risk_definition: Undocumented AI dependencies create hidden risks from supply chain vulnerabilities and component failures.

metrics.name: AI Threat Identification Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with documented threat models
metrics.formula: AI systems with threat models / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Without AI-specific threat identification, adversarial attacks and model-specific vulnerabilities remain unaddressed.

metrics.name: AI Vulnerability Assessment Completion
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with completed vulnerability assessments
metrics.formula: Assessed AI systems / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Unassessed AI systems may contain exploitable vulnerabilities in models, data pipelines, or infrastructure.

metrics.name: AI Impact Assessment Completion
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with completed impact assessments
metrics.formula: AI systems with impact assessments / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Without impact assessments, potential harm from AI failures or manipulation cannot be properly prioritized.

metrics.name: AI Risk Prioritization Currency
metrics.description: Percentage of AI risks with current prioritization rankings
metrics.formula: Currently prioritized AI risks / Total AI risks
metrics.risk_definition: Outdated risk prioritization leads to misallocation of security resources and attention to lower-priority risks.

metrics.name: AI Model Vulnerability Identification Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of AI models assessed for adversarial vulnerabilities
metrics.formula: Assessed models / Total deployed models
metrics.risk_definition: Models not assessed for adversarial vulnerabilities may be susceptible to evasion attacks and manipulation.

metrics.name: Adversarial Attack Vector Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of known adversarial attack vectors assessed for AI systems
metrics.formula: Assessed attack vectors / Known attack vectors
metrics.risk_definition: Incomplete attack vector assessment leaves AI systems exposed to known adversarial techniques.

metrics.name: Data Poisoning Risk Assessment Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of training pipelines assessed for poisoning vulnerabilities
metrics.formula: Assessed pipelines / Total training pipelines
metrics.risk_definition: Unassessed training pipelines may be vulnerable to data poisoning attacks that corrupt model behavior.

metrics.name: AI Supply Chain Vulnerability Tracking
metrics.description: Percentage of third-party AI components with vulnerability tracking
metrics.formula: Tracked components / Total third-party components
metrics.risk_definition: Untracked third-party AI components may introduce vulnerabilities from pre-trained models or ML frameworks.

metrics.name: AI Access Control Implementation
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with role-based access controls implemented
metrics.formula: AI systems with RBAC / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: AI systems without proper access controls may be accessed or modified by unauthorized users.

metrics.name: AI Model Authentication Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI model endpoints with authentication mechanisms
metrics.formula: Authenticated endpoints / Total AI endpoints
metrics.risk_definition: Unauthenticated AI endpoints allow unauthorized access to model capabilities and potential data exfiltration.

metrics.name: AI API Security Implementation
metrics.description: Percentage of AI APIs with rate limiting and input validation
metrics.formula: Secured AI APIs / Total AI APIs
metrics.risk_definition: Unsecured AI APIs are vulnerable to abuse, denial of service, and adversarial input attacks.

metrics.name: Privileged AI Operations Protection
metrics.description: Percentage of privileged AI operations requiring elevated authorization
metrics.formula: Protected privileged operations / Total privileged operations
metrics.risk_definition: Unprotected privileged operations allow unauthorized model updates, configuration changes, or system modifications.

metrics.name: Training Data Encryption at Rest
metrics.description: Percentage of training datasets encrypted at rest
metrics.formula: Encrypted training data / Total training data
metrics.risk_definition: Unencrypted training data exposes sensitive information and enables data theft or manipulation.

metrics.name: Model Weight Protection Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of model weights and parameters with access controls
metrics.formula: Protected model weights / Total model weights
metrics.risk_definition: Unprotected model weights enable model theft, reverse engineering, and intellectual property loss.

metrics.name: AI Data Transit Encryption
metrics.description: Percentage of AI data transmissions using encryption
metrics.formula: Encrypted AI transmissions / Total AI transmissions
metrics.risk_definition: Unencrypted AI data in transit enables eavesdropping, man-in-the-middle attacks, and data interception.

metrics.name: AI Data Lifecycle Management
metrics.description: Percentage of AI data with defined retention and disposal policies
metrics.formula: Managed AI data / Total AI data
metrics.risk_definition: Unmanaged AI data lifecycle leads to data sprawl, compliance violations, and unnecessary risk exposure.

metrics.name: Model Extraction Protection
metrics.description: Percentage of models with extraction attack protections enabled
metrics.formula: Protected models / Total deployed models
metrics.risk_definition: Models without extraction protection are vulnerable to theft through systematic querying and reconstruction.

metrics.name: Model Integrity Validation Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of model deployments with integrity validation
metrics.formula: Validated deployments / Total deployments
metrics.risk_definition: Deployments without integrity validation may introduce tampered or malicious models into production.

metrics.name: Secure Model Deployment Pipeline
metrics.description: Percentage of model deployments through secured CI/CD pipelines
metrics.formula: Secure deployments / Total deployments
metrics.risk_definition: Unsecured deployment pipelines allow unauthorized model changes and bypass security controls.

metrics.name: Model Version Control Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of models with version control and rollback capability
metrics.formula: Version-controlled models / Total deployed models
metrics.risk_definition: Models without version control cannot be rolled back during incidents or tracked for changes.

metrics.name: AI Behavior Monitoring Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with behavior monitoring enabled
metrics.formula: Monitored AI systems / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Unmonitored AI systems cannot detect anomalies, attacks, or degradation in real-time.

metrics.name: Model Performance Baseline Tracking
metrics.description: Percentage of models with performance baselines tracked
metrics.formula: Models with baselines / Total deployed models
metrics.risk_definition: Without performance baselines, model degradation and attacks may go undetected.

metrics.name: Data Drift Detection Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of models with data drift detection enabled
metrics.formula: Models with drift detection / Total deployed models
metrics.risk_definition: Undetected data drift leads to model performance degradation and potentially dangerous predictions.

metrics.name: AI Audit Log Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with comprehensive audit logging
metrics.formula: AI systems with audit logs / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: AI systems without audit logs cannot support forensic investigation or compliance verification.

metrics.name: Anomalous AI Output Detection Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of anomalous AI outputs detected and flagged
metrics.formula: Detected anomalies / Total anomalies (validated)
metrics.risk_definition: Undetected anomalous outputs may indicate attacks, bias issues, or model failures affecting users.

metrics.name: AI Security Event Analysis Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of AI security events analyzed within required timeframe
metrics.formula: Analyzed events / Total AI security events
metrics.risk_definition: Unanalyzed AI security events may indicate ongoing attacks that remain undetected and unremediated.

metrics.name: Model Drift Pattern Analysis
metrics.description: Percentage of drift alerts analyzed for root cause
metrics.formula: Analyzed drift alerts / Total drift alerts
metrics.risk_definition: Unanalyzed drift patterns may mask data poisoning or adversarial manipulation attempts.

metrics.name: AI Incident Correlation Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of AI incidents correlated across systems and tools
metrics.formula: Correlated AI incidents / Total AI incidents
metrics.risk_definition: Uncorrelated AI incidents miss coordinated attacks spanning multiple AI systems or components.

metrics.name: Adversarial Input Detection Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of adversarial inputs detected and blocked
metrics.formula: Detected adversarial inputs / Total adversarial inputs (validated)
metrics.risk_definition: Undetected adversarial inputs allow attackers to manipulate model behavior and bypass controls.

metrics.name: Model Manipulation Detection Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of models with manipulation detection capabilities
metrics.formula: Models with detection / Total deployed models
metrics.risk_definition: Models without manipulation detection cannot identify extraction, inversion, or backdoor attacks.

metrics.name: Data Poisoning Detection Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of data poisoning attempts detected in pipelines
metrics.formula: Detected poisoning / Total poisoning attempts (validated)
metrics.risk_definition: Undetected data poisoning corrupts model behavior and creates backdoors for attackers.

metrics.name: AI-Enabled Attack Recognition Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of AI-generated attacks recognized by security systems
metrics.formula: Recognized AI attacks / Total AI attacks (validated)
metrics.risk_definition: Unrecognized AI-enabled attacks including deepfakes and automated phishing evade traditional defenses.

metrics.name: AI Incident Response Procedure Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI incident types with documented response procedures
metrics.formula: Covered incident types / Total AI incident types
metrics.risk_definition: Missing AI incident procedures lead to ad-hoc responses and longer containment times.

metrics.name: AI Incident Escalation Definition
metrics.description: Percentage of AI incident severity levels with defined escalation paths
metrics.formula: Defined escalation paths / Total severity levels
metrics.risk_definition: Undefined escalation paths delay critical decisions and appropriate resource engagement.

metrics.name: AI System Isolation Capability
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with tested isolation capabilities
metrics.formula: AI systems with isolation / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: AI systems without isolation capability cannot be quickly contained during incidents.

metrics.name: AI Incident Documentation Completeness
metrics.description: Percentage of AI incidents with complete documentation
metrics.formula: Fully documented incidents / Total AI incidents
metrics.risk_definition: Incomplete AI incident documentation hampers post-incident analysis and improvement efforts.

metrics.name: AI Root Cause Analysis Completion
metrics.description: Percentage of AI incidents with completed root cause analysis
metrics.formula: Incidents with RCA / Total AI incidents
metrics.risk_definition: Without root cause analysis, AI incidents may recur as underlying vulnerabilities remain unaddressed.

metrics.name: AI Model Failure Analysis Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of model failures analyzed for cause determination
metrics.formula: Analyzed failures / Total model failures
metrics.risk_definition: Unanalyzed model failures may indicate attacks, bugs, or drift requiring different remediation.

metrics.name: AI Impact Assessment Timeliness
metrics.description: Percentage of AI incidents with impact assessment within SLA
metrics.formula: Timely assessments / Total AI incidents
metrics.risk_definition: Delayed impact assessments prevent appropriate resource allocation and stakeholder communication.

metrics.name: AI Lessons Learned Implementation
metrics.description: Percentage of AI incident lessons learned implemented
metrics.formula: Implemented lessons / Total identified lessons
metrics.risk_definition: Unimplemented lessons learned result in repeated incidents and missed improvement opportunities.

metrics.name: Compromised Model Containment Time
metrics.description: Average time to contain compromised AI models
metrics.formula: Average model containment time in hours
metrics.risk_definition: Slow containment allows compromised models to continue affecting users and business operations.

metrics.name: Model Rollback Success Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of model rollbacks completed successfully
metrics.formula: Successful rollbacks / Total rollback attempts
metrics.risk_definition: Failed rollbacks extend incident duration and may leave compromised models in production.

metrics.name: Adversarial Attack Mitigation Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of known adversarial attacks with mitigation implemented
metrics.formula: Mitigated attack types / Known attack types
metrics.risk_definition: Missing mitigations for known attacks leave AI systems vulnerable to exploitation.

metrics.name: AI Service Continuity During Incidents
metrics.description: Percentage of AI service availability maintained during incidents
metrics.formula: Maintained availability / Target availability
metrics.risk_definition: AI service disruption during incidents impacts business operations and user experience.

metrics.name: AI Recovery Plan Coverage
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with documented recovery plans
metrics.formula: AI systems with recovery plans / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: AI systems without recovery plans face extended downtime and ad-hoc restoration processes.

metrics.name: AI Backup Procedure Compliance
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems meeting backup requirements
metrics.formula: Compliant AI backups / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Non-compliant AI backups may be insufficient for recovery or fail during restoration.

metrics.name: AI Recovery Testing Frequency
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems with recovery testing within required timeframe
metrics.formula: Recently tested AI systems / Total AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: Untested AI recovery procedures may fail during actual incidents, extending downtime.

metrics.name: AI Business Continuity Integration
metrics.description: Percentage of AI systems integrated with organizational BCP
metrics.formula: Integrated AI systems / Total critical AI systems
metrics.risk_definition: AI systems not integrated with BCP may be overlooked during disaster recovery activation.

metrics.name: Model Retraining Procedure Definition
metrics.description: Percentage of models with defined retraining procedures
metrics.formula: Models with retraining procedures / Total deployed models
metrics.risk_definition: Models without retraining procedures face delays in recovery from poisoning or corruption.

metrics.name: Clean Data Restoration Capability
metrics.description: Percentage of training datasets with clean restoration capability
metrics.formula: Datasets with clean copies / Total training datasets
metrics.risk_definition: Datasets without clean copies cannot be restored after poisoning, requiring full reconstruction.

metrics.name: Post-Recovery Model Validation Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of recovered models validated before production deployment
metrics.formula: Validated recoveries / Total model recoveries
metrics.risk_definition: Unvalidated recovered models may have residual issues or fail to meet performance requirements.

metrics.name: AI Recovery Improvement Implementation
metrics.description: Percentage of recovery improvements implemented from incident analysis
metrics.formula: Implemented improvements / Identified improvements
metrics.risk_definition: Unimplemented recovery improvements result in repeated recovery failures and extended downtime.
